testcase.purpose: Validate if Crosswalk Browser works with system proxy

description.pre_condition: 1.Make sure system proxy are setted. 2.Make sure Crosswalk application is launched and the device connected to network 3.Package a web app,it contains below web links:http://www.sina.com.cn 4.Install this web app
